item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2016/02/15/supreme-court-nominations/#comment-4460">Jim Vanderveen</a>.
Indeed. And if they don't like the nominee, then vote to reject them.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Jim Vanderveen.

Indeed. And if they don’t like the nominee, then vote to reject them.

item.title: By: Jim Vanderveen
item.dc:creator: Jim Vanderveen
item.description: Good research, thanks! Yes, there is absolutely <b>plenty</b> of time to nominate and confirm an appointee, as Pres. Reagan's example shows.
item.content:encoded: Good research, thanks! Yes, there is absolutely plenty of time to nominate and confirm an appointee, as Pres. Reagan’s example shows.
